title: Nami skin: Tundra Nami Concept Art

embed.description: I was so damn lazy on this one but i wanted to draw it! at the beginning of october i wished for a winter based Nami skin.no christmas skin.. just a pretty winter skin. and well.yea Nami is (c) by ...

body:
Nami needs more love. :)

Support your supports! Not enough people play them.

(Art not mine)

{{champion:105}} Approves.

P.S. I know she's already gotten a skin recently...

replies.body:
Jeez, this post is old.

Still, it looks perfect for Nami. I don't say this much, but Rito plz!!
Rito make this! I play a lot of name and this I would buy in a heartbeat. It would really complement my artic warfare Caitlyn.
